Castle_Rock.Douglas County High School (Castle Rock,:
This article is on the high school in Colorado; for other Douglas County High Schools, please see Douglas County High School

Douglas County High School, sometimes nicknamed as DCHS and locally identified as DC, is a public high school in Castle Rock, Colorado, United States. It is the oldest school in the Douglas County School District.


== History ==
Elementary through high school classes were held in the Cantril School building in Castle Rock from 1897 through 1907.
